label: zkSync L2 JSON-RPC
name: zkSyncL2JSONRPC
description: Interact with the zkSync Layer 2 JSON-RPC API for various blockchain operations.

actions.label: Estimate Fee
actions.name: zks_estimateFee
actions.description: Estimate the fee for a given transaction call.

actions.label: Estimate Gas for L1 to L2
actions.name: zks_estimateGasL1ToL2
actions.description: Estimate the gas required for a transaction from Layer 1 to Layer 2.

actions.label: Get Bridge Contracts
actions.name: zks_getBridgeContracts
actions.description: Retrieve the addresses of bridge contracts for tokens on L2.

actions.label: Get L1 Chain ID
actions.name: zks_L1ChainId
actions.description: Return the chain ID of the connected Layer 1 network.

actions.label: Get L2 to L1 Log Proof
actions.name: zks_getL2ToL1LogProof
actions.description: Generate a proof for an L2 â†’ L1 log.

actions.label: Get Main Contract
actions.name: zks_getMainContract
actions.description: Retrieve the address of the zkSync main contract.

actions.label: Get Testnet Paymaster
actions.name: zks_getTestnetPaymaster
actions.description: Retrieve the address of the testnet paymaster (only available on testnet).

credentials.label: zkSync RPC Endpoint
credentials.name: rpcEndpoint
credentials.description: The RPC endpoint URL for the zkSync network.

inputParameters.label: Data
inputParameters.name: data
inputParameters.description: The data payload for the transaction.

inputParameters.label: Log Index
inputParameters.name: logIndex
inputParameters.description: The index of the log entry to prove.

inputParameters.label: Transaction Hash
inputParameters.name: transactionHash
inputParameters.description: The hash of the transaction containing the log.
